TemporalDirections.TEXT: 349,HELEN & MORTY,"Oh, well...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 350,JERRY,And there was a little problem with the physical chemistry.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 351,HELEN,"Well, I think shes a very attractive girl.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 352,JERRY,"Oh, she is, she absolutely is.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 353,HELEN,I can see if there was a weight problem...,1.0,S01E01,1.0 354,JERRY,"No, its not that. It wasnt all one-sided.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 355,HELEN,"You know, you cant be so particular. Nobodys perfect.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 356,JERRY,"I know, I know...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 357,MORTY,"Yknow Jerry, its a good thing I wasnt so particular.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 358,HELEN,"(hits Morty) Idiot. (to Jerry) So whore you looking for, Sophia Loren?",1.0,S01E01,1.0

DIALOGUE.text: So whore you looking for, Sophia Loren?

RELATION.toText: So whore you looking for, Sophia Loren?
